Description: On I-81 at mile marker 50.3 in the County of Smyth, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 285.6 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Twin Bridge, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 608 North in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of Popes Station Rd; Rt. 609E/W (Southampton County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Minor Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 54.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 9.2 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south left shoulder, left lane, and left center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
